General.Name: Hunan Junxin Environmental Protection Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hunan Junxin Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. operates as an environmental protection company in China. The company invests in, operates, and manages domestic waste, municipal sludge, landfill leachate and ash landfills, and other treatment and disposal facilities. It is also involved in the waste incineration power generation activities. Hunan Junxin Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Ofc Bldg of Hunan Junxin Environmental, Changsha, China, 410200
